items.title: The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring
items.description: A hobbit wants destroy the One Ring and the dark lord Sauron.

items.title: The Godfather
items.description: The aging patriarch of an organized crime dynasty transfers control of his clandestine empire to his reluctant son.

items.title: Star Wars
items.description: Luke Skywalker joins forces with a Jedi Knight, a cocky pilot, a wookiee and two droids to save the universe from the Empire world-destroying battle-station, while also attempting to rescue Princess Leia from the evil Darth Vader.
